definition: P followed by 4 digit integer. P0999 is structural entry for unnamed persons
Family name of a person by which he/she is commonly known; i.e. Lu for Lu Xun (instead of Zhou Shuren); Bei for Bei Dao (not Zhao Zhenkai)
First name
Language code of this name
'male' or 'female'. If you have encountered any other possibility please open an issue. :-)
records whether or when a person experienced rustication; write 'NULL'  if not provide year for yes
add a four-digit number; time between 1968-1979. Add 'NULL' in case he or she has not been a Zhiqing. Add 'unknown' in case we do not know the time
add a four-digit number; time between 1968-1979. Add 'NULL' in case he or she has not been a Zhiqing. Add 'unknown' in case we do not know the time
place of rustication (or major place of rustication if several). Add 'NULL' in case he or she has not been a Zhiqing. Add 'unknown' in case we do not know the place.
provide birth year here
provide death year here
Alternative family name under which a person may also be known i.e. Zhou Shuren for Lu Xun. Limit to one pseudonym per person.
Language code of this name
Record city / town where a person was born

Social position of a person: worker; party-cadre;… It is only necessary to record the SP of persons who were reading. Add 'unknown' in case you do not know. It is not necessary for those who are only authors in our data-set such as Shakespeare or Lu Xun. For them add 'NULL'.

Record whether a person had access to neibu material (access means: oneself or one‘s relatives were authorized to receive neibu materials over a period of time): yes/no; add NULL in case that this does not apply; p.e. for Shakespeare; for Lu Xun or for a Chinese person living in the 1970s outside of China
Reference to a text in which relevant information to an author is recorded. This can be an URL as well.
Page number in a text that the column source_id refers to; for several pages use 7-10. Add 'ONLINE SOURCE' for online sources
2nd reference to a text in which relevant information to an author is recorded. This can be an URL as well.
Page number in a text that the column source_id refers to; for several pages use 7-10. Add 'ONLINE SOURCE' for online sources

The commentary can include the information that one person‘s birth place is not the place where he grew up or other necessary additional information. Keep it as short as possible and as long as necessary.
